headline: Software companies are 'overly maligned,' analyst says
summary: Palantir (PLTR) reported fourth quarter earnings on Monday that beat Wall Street's expectations. DA Davidson head of technology research Gil Luria joins Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman to discuss the overall software sector, whether he thinks it will continue to struggle, and how Palantir fits into the space. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

content.title: Software companies are 'overly maligned,' analyst says

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
